title: Amid Bloodshed, Brotherhood: Links Forged From Iraq's Game Of Rings
teaser: In Iraq, a Ramadan game called Mheibbis brings even Sunnis and Shiites together in peaceful competition.
contentencoded:
In Iraq, a Ramadan game called Mheibbis brings even Sunnis and Shiites together in peaceful competition. A ring game traditionally played between neighborhoods during the holy month, Mheibbis has offered men the opportunity to break Baghdad's tension and offer messages of unity and brotherhood â€” even between rival sects.
